data: {"generalSituation":"The band of clouds now covering southern China will thin out today. The weather will improve slightly over the region. Under the influence of a replenishment of the northeast monsoon, it will be windy and cloudier over the coast of Guangdong in the next couple of days. With the anticyclone aloft strengthening, the weather will be mainly fine and temperatures will rise over southern China during the weekend and early next week. Besides, Tropical Cyclone Kalmaegi will move across the central and southern parts of the South China Sea towards the vicinity of central Vietnam in the next couple of days. The tropical cyclone now to the south of Guam will intensify gradually and move in the general direction of the vicinity of Luzon in the next few days. Under the influence of the northeast monsoon, its movement remains uncertain afterwards.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251105","week":"Wednesday","forecastWind":"Northeast force 4.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy.
